snippet: The agreement will form joint venture, while a Rosneft subsidiary will acquire shares in shale and oil fields in West Texas and western Canada and Exxon oil and gas fields in the Gulf of Mexico.
abstract: Exxon Mobil and the Russian state oil company Rosneft sign agreement to form a joint venture; Rosneft subsidiary will acquire shares in shale and oil fields in West Texas and western Canada and Exxon oil and gas fields in the Gulf of Mexico and Exxon Mobil will have expanded access to Russia's offshore Arctic fields.
lead_paragraph: The agreement will form joint venture, while a Rosneft subsidiary will acquire shares in shale and oil fields in West Texas and western Canada and Exxon oil and gas fields in the Gulf of Mexico.

headline.seo: Exxon and Russia’s Oil Company in Deal for Joint Projects
headline.main: Exxon and Russia’s Oil Company in Deal for Joint Projects
headline.print_headline: Exxon and Russia’s Oil Company in Deal for Joint Projects
